The extension stops pop-ups before they even appear, letting you enjoy the content you came for. It's designed to keep ads and trackers out, so your information stays private.

No ads means faster page loads and a lighter browsing experience.

Itâ€™s quick and easyâ€”no setup needed. Just add it, and it blocks ads instantly.

Ads and pop-ups can be annoying, especially on sites you visit every day. Our extension blocks them all, letting you enjoy a clean, ad-free web.
Itâ€™s perfect if you want to keep things simpleâ€”just install it, and forget about ads.

With AdBlock and its Pop-up blocker, every site becomes ad-free and easier to use.

Whether itâ€™s YouTube, Facebook, or any other site, AdBlock blocks ads and helps protect your privacy. No more waiting for ads to load or skipping annoying pop-ups.
